fields.name: *You know your way around computers and can hack, if necessary. However, your social skills are your real strength:
fields.value:
lying and cheating to get the NETSEC group ahead of the competition.*
Attack:None
Defense:None
Hacking Skill:Low

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may attempt to hack a node. The chance of success is increased depending on how many people attempt to hack the node.
- Twice per game, you may disguise your whispers as another player's. Two night cooldown
- Twice per game, learn another player's exact faction, bypassing any frames, disguises, sleeper agents, ect. Four night cooldown
- Once per game, you may roleblock all your visitors
- Twice per game, redirect all your visitors to another another player
